meanings.definition: relating to the act or process of transporting
meanings.sent1: The transportational vehicles were efficient in moving goods.
meanings.sent2: The truck is a transportational vehicle that carries heavy loads.
meanings.sent3: The transportational bus driver took a wrong turn and ended up at the zoo!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a transportational bridge connecting people's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The transportational system in the city made commuting easy for everyone.

meanings.definition: capable of or used for transporting
meanings.sent1: The transportational ship sailed across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: A bicycle is a transportational vehicle for short distances.
meanings.sent3: The transportational drone delivered the package right to the doorstep.
meanings.sent4: His words were a transportational tool to convey his feelings.
meanings.sent5: The transportational capabilities of the new car impressed the buyers.

meanings.definition: the act or process of transporting
meanings.sent1: The transportational of goods by train is cost-effective.
meanings.sent2: Air transportational is faster than sea transportational.
meanings.sent3: The transportational of penguins to the new exhibit was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: Love is the ultimate transportational for happiness.
meanings.sent5: The transportational of memories through photographs is priceless.
